content:
Right now the message options overlap with the message content in the mobile view. Related discussion is
https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/6-frontend/topic/Overlap.20in.20Mobile.20View/near/1103240

So, how does this design look for mobile view?
Difference between Before and After
How is the "After", suggestions are needed so as to fix the overlap.
The "After" seems clearly better to me. I am glad you are working on this!
While the After looks a bit visually nicer than the overlap, we can do a lot better than having an essentially blank line for every message.
@Tim Abbott any suggestion what to try?

@Priyam Seth (Signior-X) One idea would be to adjust the UI to just have the star state visible, and then make the click target be the timestamp for opening the actions menu. (And tweak things so that one can do emoji from there). That way, we'd effectively remove those 3 widgets for the mobile web view.
